mapper.insert: insert into battle_history (battle_idx, user_id, occupy_time, branch_idx) values (null, #{userId}, timestampdiff(second, #{startTime},now()), #{branchIdx} );
mapper.select: select distinct user_id, sum(occupy_time) over (partition by user_id) sum_occupy_time from battle_history order by sum_occupy_time desc limit 10;
